page.title: 07KIVETON PARK STATION
page.content: Kiveton Park passenger station is situated between Shireoaks and Kiveton Bridge stations on the Sheffield to Lincoln line. The freight line that runs through Anston, Dinnington & Laughton stations joins at Brancliffe Junction, just east of Kiveton Park station. That line was closed to passenger traffic in 1929. The old station yard has been redeveloped as a storage warehouse for Fyffes bananas. The old station building which stood empty for years is now being used by DMS Electronics, a company specialising in computer sales, maintenance and development. The Station Hotel ,now a pub, which used to provide accomodation for travellers is on the other side of the minor road (B6059).
